languages.text: {n}Маражай легко поигрывает клинками и издевательски смеется в лицо противнику.{/n} "Я могу продолжать танцевать с тобой еще долго, очень долго... но мне начинают надоедать твои жалкие попытки".
{n}Marazhai lightly brandishes his blades, laughing mockingly in his opponent's face.{/n} "I can continue dancing with you for a long, long time... but I am growing weary of your pathetic attempts."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай легко поигрывает клинками и издевательски смеется в лицо противнику.{/n} "Я могу продолжать танцевать с тобой еще долго, очень долго... но мне начинают надоедать твои жалкие попытки".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai lightly brandishes his blades, laughing mockingly in his opponent's face.{/n} "I can continue dancing with you for a long, long time... but I am growing weary of your pathetic attempts."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋好整以暇地转了转手中的刀，嘲弄地看着他的对手。{/n}“我可以陪你把这支舞一直、一直跳下去……但我已经对你徒劳的反抗感到厌烦了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lightly brandishes his blades, laughing mockingly in his opponent's face.{/n} "I can continue dancing with you for a long, long time... but I am growing weary of your pathetic attempts."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋好整以暇地转了转手中的刀，嘲弄地看着他的对手。{/n}“我可以陪你把这支舞一直、一直跳下去……但我已经对你徒劳的反抗感到厌烦了。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai alardea hábilmente con sus espadas, mofándose de su rival con una risa burlona.{/n} «Puedo bailar contigo mucho, mucho tiempo... pero me canso de tus patéticas acometidas».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lightly brandishes his blades, laughing mockingly in his opponent's face.{/n} "I can continue dancing with you for a long, long time... but I am growing weary of your pathetic attempts."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai alardea hábilmente con sus espadas, mofándose de su rival con una risa burlona.{/n} «Puedo bailar contigo mucho, mucho tiempo... pero me canso de tus patéticas acometidas».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai lève ses lames avec désinvolture et s'adresse d'un air moqueur à son adversaire :{/n} « Je pourrais continuer à danser avec vous durant des heures... mais vos tentatives pathétiques me lassent au plus haut point. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lightly brandishes his blades, laughing mockingly in his opponent's face.{/n} "I can continue dancing with you for a long, long time... but I am growing weary of your pathetic attempts."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai lève ses lames avec désinvolture et s'adresse d'un air moqueur à son adversaire :{/n} « Je pourrais continuer à danser avec vous durant des heures... mais vos tentatives pathétiques me lassent au plus haut point. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai fuchtelt leicht mit seinen Klingen herum und lacht seinem Gegner spöttisch ins Gesicht.{/n} "Ich kann noch ewig lang mit Euch tanzen ... aber so langsam bin ich Eure kläglichen Versuche leid."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lightly brandishes his blades, laughing mockingly in his opponent's face.{/n} "I can continue dancing with you for a long, long time... but I am growing weary of your pathetic attempts."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai fuchtelt leicht mit seinen Klingen herum und lacht seinem Gegner spöttisch ins Gesicht.{/n} "Ich kann noch ewig lang mit Euch tanzen ... aber so langsam bin ich Eure kläglichen Versuche leid."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは軽やかに刃を振り回し、あざ笑うように笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「俺はもっともっとお前たちと踊り続けられる…だが、哀れな戦いにももう飽き飽きしてきたところだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lightly brandishes his blades, laughing mockingly in his opponent's face.{/n} "I can continue dancing with you for a long, long time... but I am growing weary of your pathetic attempts."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは軽やかに刃を振り回し、あざ笑うように笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「俺はもっともっとお前たちと踊り続けられる…だが、哀れな戦いにももう飽き飽きしてきたところだ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, rakibinin yüzüne karşı alay edercesine gülerek hafifçe bıçaklarını savuruyor.{/n} "Seninle böyle dans etmeye çok daha uzun bir süre devam edebilirim ama... İçler acısı saldırılarından sıkılmaya başladım."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lightly brandishes his blades, laughing mockingly in his opponent's face.{/n} "I can continue dancing with you for a long, long time... but I am growing weary of your pathetic attempts."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, rakibinin yüzüne karşı alay edercesine gülerek hafifçe bıçaklarını savuruyor.{/n} "Seninle böyle dans etmeye daha çok, çok uzun süre devam edebilirim ama... İçler acısı saldırılarından sıkılmaya başladım."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
